DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Immune Globulin Treatment Compared Placebo Patients With Myasthenia Gravis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients age 18 year old diagnosis myasthenia gravis ( MG ) worsen weakness enrol study provide informed consent . Fifty-two patient recruit study , one withdrew consent prior start 51 patient recruit . Baseline clinical assessment use Quantitative MG Score Disease Severity ( QMGS ) repeat 2 4 week treatment IVIG saline infusion . The Post-Intervention Status assess 2 4 week treatment . The treatment randomize double-masked . Electrophysiological immunological test do baseline 2 week . Baseline characteristic compare Student 's test continuous variable Chi-square test categorical variable . An analysis covariance perform primary outcome measure , change QMGS .
